headline: Radish harvests in Lower Silesia higher than ever before
text:
Lower Silesian farmers celebrating a record-breaking radish harvest, local markets filled with produce, radish enthusiasts overjoyed.

"I don't care" - said Stjepan Kovaèeviæ, a random citizen of Zagreb, Croatia when interviewed on the street.

headline: New gadget discovered by team of international scientists
text: A group of ten scientists from all over Europe have been working on a peculiar gadget for the past few months. "Professor Stim hasn't left his lab since the final version of the gadget has been released" - says Professor G. T.
